prompts: Create a lava-themed Pokemon that resembles a snail with fiery features and a rocky shell.
Show me a fire-type creature with a molten body and a shell that looks like a volcano.
Generate a Pokemon with bright red skin, a rock-like back, and glowing yellow eyes.
Imagine a Pokemon that moves slowly but has a powerful heat-based attack and a rugged appearance.
Design a Pokemon that can thrive in hot environments, with a body that seems to ooze lava.
Give me a creature that has a unique combination of fire and rock traits, perfect for battling.
Make a Pokemon whose main feature is a burning flame on its back, with a slimy texture.
